sentence: The leader of the "Let's Go Brandon" cryptocurrency revealed that Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) traded the meme coin three weeks before NASCAR driver Brandon Brown announced he had struck a sponsorship deal with the coin, heightening suspicion from watchdogs that the beleaguered congressman may have violated insider trading laws.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Meme coin leader's admission could land Madison Cawthorn in more hot water

sentence: At the moment, Greene, Lauren Boebert, and Madison Cawthorn have the power mostly to marshal attention.
author: David A. Graham
title: The Wackadoodle Wave
